article.title: Mission Essential Names Doran, Mason to New Posts
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Mission Essential Personnel LLC, Chantilly, Virginia, has named John G. Doran vice president, Language Operations Group, and senior program manager, U.S. Army Intelligence and Security Command Indefinite Delivery/Indefinite Quantity contract; and Brett S. Mason vice president and senior program manager, Intelligence Services Group.
